song_name: Sound of Letting Go (feat. Chris Willis)
lyrics:
6 contributorssound of letting go lyricsverse 1
this is the point of no return
cause this is where we crash and burn
and now every time i face this pain
i can hear it coming back again
its the sound of letting go

chorus
its the sound of letting go
its the sound of letting go
its the sound of letting go
its the sound of letting go

verse 2
breaking up and breaking down
this is what weve come to now
whats the use we cant deny
cant you hear it
its the sound of letting go

verse 3
we could go around all day
fine excuses we can say
in the silence i can hear
cant you feel it
its the sound of letting go
see david guetta liveget tickets as low as 80you might also likebridge
its getting louder and louder
what we gonna do
its getting louder and louder
fillin up the room
i can hear it hear it
comin over us
i can hear it tellin me that we had enough
its getting louder and louder
what we gonna do
its getting louder and louder
fillin up the room
i can hear it hear it
comin over us

chorus 2
its the sound of letting go
i know you can hear it
its the sound of letting go
i know we cant deceive it
i know you can hear it
its the sound of letting go
i know we cant deceive it
its the sound of letting go

verse 4
i cant let it break me down
this is what weve come to now
whats the use we cant deny cant you hear it
its the sound of letting go
every time i face this pain
i hear it coming back again
and ive been calling out your name cant you hear it
its the sound of letting go
breakdown
i can hear it
i can hear it
i can hear it

outro
its the sound of letting go
i can hear it
i can hear it
its the sound of letting go
i can hear it
i can hear it
its the sound of letting goembed
